profileAlternative.name: Jesse Showalter
profileAlternative.headline: Full Stack Designer | YouTuber
profileAlternative.summary:
Highly innovative, passionate and straight shooting Product UI/UX Design with high proficiencies in problem-solving, visual UI design, UX design, user-centered design principles and methodologies, product development, and front-end development.

A unique skill-set that spans various disciplines from digital marketing to hands-on UI/UX design to front-end development (HTML/CSS/JavaScript). Over 10 years of experience in understanding and developing products from concept ideas into production. Highly effective written and verbal communicator with exceptional problem-solving skills.

Capabilities include:

• Product Design
• UI/UX Design
• Visual UI Design
• Prototyping
• Critical Thinking
• Problem Solving
• Branding (Identity)
• Strategy & Planning
• HTML/CSS/Javascript
• Sketch, Invision, Adobe Creative Suite

positions.title: Assistant Graphic Designer and Media Specialist

given.text:
Jesse is one of the most forward thinking and innovative web designers that I have ever come across. Not only does he create beautiful websites, every element of a design creates a perfect User Experience. I am a big fan of Jesse's work. As an added bonus, I learned quite a bit from Jesse. From simple HTML to techniques in design. Jesse is a great teacher and knows exactly how to relate pieces of information so that they are easy to absorb.
…
See more

Jesse is an awesome and exciting UI/UX designer to work with – the energy and creative insight that he brings to the projects he works on is contagious. From concepting to presentation and through launch, Jesse can be relied on to deliver excellence work.

Jesse has proven himself to be not just a talented and inspired web designer but an all around great team member. He's eager to please and is deftly skilled at interpreting often ambiguous concepts. He works well on his own and can be counted on to deliver first class projects on time. His opinions and suggestions are often right on the money and when at times I feel they are not, he has a keen awareness and sensitively to step back and give me time to realize he was right in the first place. This alone is quite a skill as I can be very difficult to work with and at times fancy myself the Anna Wintour of the company. I know Jesse will be massively successful in his endeavors throughout his life and I will always feel honored to have spent time working with him. Jesse has my highest recommendation and respect.
…
See more

received.text: Alex is a professional, efficient and knowledgeable asset to have on a team. By managing the projects, tasks, and essentially the team so well, He made my job as a designer so much more enjoyable. He allowed me to focus and do what I do best by committing himself to excellence at all times. I would recommend working with him if you value efficiency and productivity in your team.

peopleAlsoViewed.text: I teach creatives how to make money doing what they love and not lose their soul. Design+Business = Business of Design
COO at The Futur. Strategist, award-winning designer, and father of the year.
UI/UX Designer & Digital Strategist for Fortune 500s
Managing risk, developing strategy, and empowering team members
